Qwerty
Class AIControlMedium

java.lang.Object
  Qwerty.AIControl
      Qwerty.AIControlMedium
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player
public class AIControlMedium
extends AIControl

The only algorithmic difference between this AIMedium and the AI easy from the other class is that this AI runs the same word choosing algorithm for all letters on the board that are only connected to two or less letters. Other than that it runs exactly the same algorithm as the easy, but is more skilled, as it tests more locations.

Author:
Abhishek, Jeffrey, Aneesh
